# view

**Instance Property**

The custom view you use to draw the toolbar item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var view: NSView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Many properties of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItem] automatically forward changes to the associated custom [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView] object, if the view has a property or accessor method with a matching name.

## Getting the item’s visual appearance

- **image**: The image to display for the toolbar item.
- **backgroundTintColor**
